de.unisiegen.tpml.graphics
Interface ProofView

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractProofView, BigStepView, SmallStepView, TypeCheckerView
public interface ProofView

Base interface to the proof views that operate on the de.unisiegen.tpml.core.ProofModels and display them to the user. New proof views are allocated from the ProofViewFactory class.

Version:
$Rev$
Author:
Marcell Fischbach, Benedikt Meurer
See Also:
de.unisiegen.tpml.core.ProofModel, ProofViewFactory

Method Summary
 void guess()
          Determines the first unproven node and tries to guess a proof rule to apply to that node.
 boolean isAdvanced()
          Returns true if the proof view is in advanced mode.
 void setAdvanced(boolean advanced)
          If advanced is true, the proof view will operate in advanced mode, otherwise in beginner mode.
 

Method Detail

isAdvanced

boolean isAdvanced()
Returns true if the proof view is in advanced mode. This affects certains parts of the view behavior. For example, for the small step proof view, the rule menu displays only axiom rules.

Returns:
true if advanced mode is being used.
See Also:
setAdvanced(boolean)

setAdvanced

void setAdvanced(boolean advanced)
If advanced is true, the proof view will operate in advanced mode, otherwise in beginner mode.

Parameters:
advanced - true to operate in advanced mode, false to operate in beginner mode.
See Also:
isAdvanced()

guess

void guess()
           throws IllegalStateException,
                  ProofGuessException
Determines the first unproven node and tries to guess a proof rule to apply to that node.

Throws:
ProofGuessException - if the proof model failes to guess the next rule.
IllegalStateException
